attributes.action: Review the percentage entitlement for medical care in the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Where UK citizens choose to live in a member state of the EU, they are currently entitled to 65% of their medical bills paid.
If they stayed in the UK then they would receive 100%. Many people choose to retire to member states after paying their National Insurance contributions all their working life. Where it can be seen that the person had paid their contributions for 44 years + then they should be entitled to 100%. Some have paid for at least 49 years
The extra help that pensioners get in the UK is not available to pensioners living in other member countries
